content: Go straight first, then look for the archer on the lower level to the right. Once you've eradicated the archer, follow the path all the way to the right to find three Revenant Charbones guarding a **Luoija Fragrant Vine**.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Woods_of_Ember_Walkthrough.md', within the main section titled 'Woods of Ember Walkthrough', specifically from the subsection 'Height of Ember' and the sub-subsection 'Yoaguai Chief - Father of Stones'.
The content is as follows:
Go straight first, then look for the archer on the lower level to the right. Once you've eradicated the archer, follow the path all the way to the right to find three Revenant Charbones guarding a **Luoija Fragrant Vine**.
